cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with algorithmic design of information structures for persuasion or signaling, which is a topic in game theory (cs.GT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also involves optimization problems and approximation algorithms, which are relevant to computer science theory (cs.DS) and information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the paper discusses computational complexity and efficiency, which are important in machine learning (cs.LG).
